code: import{BSC,Token,TokenAmount,WETH}from'sb1swap-sdk';export function wrappedCurrency(currency,chainId){return chainId&&currency===BSC?WETH[chainId]:currency instanceof Token?currency:undefined;}export function wrappedCurrencyAmount(currencyAmount,chainId){var token=currencyAmount&&chainId?wrappedCurrency(currencyAmount.currency,chainId):undefined;return token&&currencyAmount?new TokenAmount(token,currencyAmount.raw):undefined;}export function unwrappedToken(token){if(token.equals(WETH[token.chainId]))return BSC;return token;}
